includedAssets.synopsis: Season four kicks off as Raylan uncovers an unsettling family secret while tracking a dangerous fugitive.

includedAssets.title: Where's Waldo?
includedAssets.synopsis: While Raylan tangles with members of a dangerous family, Boyd targets an unusual preacher who is cutting into his business.

includedAssets.title: Truth And Consequences
includedAssets.synopsis: As well as finding himself in trouble with the FBI, Raylan's love life also becomes more complicated. Elsewhere, the church strikes back at Boyd.

includedAssets.title: The Bird Has Flown

includedAssets.synopsis: While Raylan tangles with a bare-knuckle brawler, Boyd and Ava have a tough decision to make when Ellen May returns.

includedAssets.title: Kin
includedAssets.synopsis: Raylan encounters unexpected danger while searching for Drew Thompson. Elsewhere, Colton's hunt for Ellen May becomes desperate.

includedAssets.title: Money Trap
includedAssets.synopsis: When an old enemy escapes custody, Raylan is compelled to track him down. Meanwhile, Boyd and Ava find more than they expected at a high society party.

includedAssets.title: Get Drew
includedAssets.synopsis: As Raylan, Boyd and the Detroit mob race to find Drew Thompson, the wanted man turns in an unexpected direction for help when his escape route is blocked.

includedAssets.synopsis: Boyd and the Detroit mob pull out all the stops to try to stop Drew from leaving Harlan and escaping their grasp.
